import seaborn as sns
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

plt.figure(figsize = (15,8))
ax = sns.barplot(x=top_25_apps.index, y="Installs_per_million" ,data=top_25_apps)
ax.set_xlabel('Apps')
ax.set_ylabel('Installs per million')
ax.set_xticklabels(ax.get_xticklabels(), rotation=90, fontsize=12)
ax.set_title("Top 25: Most Installed Apps", fontsize = 25)
plt.show()
